amendment.description: Amendment eliminates funding for the Office of the Under Secretary for Natural Resources and Environment and transfers $693,000 to Resource Conservation and Development programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out the account for salaries and expenses of the Office of the Under Secretary for Natural Resources and Environment ($693,000), and to transfer that amount to the account for Resource Conservation and Development.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Berry amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
